feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 17 Aug 2023 06:01:17
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Philo TV: A low-cost TV streaming service that offers a wide range of channels and on-demand content.
- B-2 stealth bombers in Iceland: The B-2 stealth bombers are deployed in Iceland for the first time since a mishap grounded the fleet.
- Wagner registered as an 'educational organization': Wagner, known for brutality in Ukraine and a failed mutiny in Russia, is now registered as an 'educational organization' in its new home.
- The decommissioning of a $362 million warship: The US Navy decommissioned a warship that was not even in service for 5 years.
- EV maker Vinfast's stock tanks: Despite a 19% drop in stock value, EV maker Vinfast is still valued higher than Ford and GM.
- Atlanta Fed projects nearly 6% US GDP growth: The Atlanta Fed predicts significant GDP growth for the third quarter.
- Google's SGE Search AI detects false information: Google's SGE Search AI is able to identify and label false AI-generated information as true.
- AI-generated poems narrated by Werner Herzog: A new audiobook features AI-generated poems narrated by Werner Herzog.
- Roblox to allow users to sell custom-made avatar bodies and heads: Roblox is introducing a feature that allows users to sell their own custom-made avatar bodies and heads.

Business:
- $100,000 debt paid off with 7 bank accounts: A 30-something individual shares their experience of paying off a large debt by managing multiple bank accounts.
- US climate law fuels factory frenzy: The US climate law has led to a surge in factory construction.
- India buys oil from UAE using its own currency: India has made a significant move by ditching the dollar and using its own currency to purchase oil from the UAE.
- Russia's ruble spikes: The Russian ruble experiences a spike as Putin and officials explore ways to stabilize the currency.

AI:
- Google's SGE Search AI detects false information: Google's SGE Search AI is capable of identifying false AI-generated information and labeling it as true.
- LlamaGPT: A self-hosted, offline, private AI chatbot powered by Llama 2.

Other:
- Taylor Swift as the subject of a new course on social psychology: A psychologist explains why Taylor Swift has become the subject of a new course on social psychology.
- Identifying fire victims in Maui: The challenges of identifying victims in a fire incident in Maui.
- Western states allowed to use more water from the Colorado River: Federal authorities grant permission for Western states to temporarily increase their use of water from the Colorado River.
- Tricks to save money on TV streaming: Tips on how to save money as streaming service prices increase.
- Trump and co-conspirators face RICO indictment: Trump, along with 18 co-conspirators including Rudy Giuliani and Mark Meadows, is charged in a Georgia RICO indictment.
- Georgia prosecutors aim to start Trump's trial before GOP primaries: Georgia prosecutors want to begin Trump's trial the day before the biggest GOP primaries in 2024.
- How to post a Facebook Story using a computer or mobile device: A guide on how to post a Facebook Story using different devices.
- US stocks fall as Fed minutes indicate potential rate hikes: US stocks experience a decline as Federal Reserve minutes suggest the possibility of further rate hikes.
- Luck be a Landlord banned in 13 countries: The game "Luck be a Landlord" is banned in 13 countries on the Google Play Store.
- Self-taught transition to AI/ML fields: A discussion on the feasibility of making a self-taught transition to AI/ML related fields.
- 3D printer nightmare fuel: Bambu X1C and P1P printers start printing while owners are asleep, causing unexpected results.

Insights:
- The tech section highlights advancements in streaming services, military deployments, and AI capabilities.
- The business section focuses on financial management, the impact of climate laws, and global economic developments.
- The AI section showcases the potential of AI in detecting false information and powering chatbots.
- The other section covers a range of topics including celebrity influence, legal proceedings, social media usage, and global events.
- Overall, the report highlights the intersection of technology, business, AI, and various other aspects of society, providing insights into the current trends and developments in these areas.
